text: The 1 August 2007 Baghdad bombings occurred on 1 August 2007, when several suicide bombings and car bombings occurred in Baghdad, the capital of Iraq. In one of the attacks, a fuel tanker exploded near a petrol station in the suburb of Mansour, killing 50 people. == References == Category:2007 murders in Iraq Category:August 2007 crimes Category:August 2007 events in Asia Category:Mass murder in 2007 Category:Suicide bombings in Baghdad Category:Car and truck bombings in Iraq Category:Terrorist incidents in Iraq in 2007 Category:Terrorist incidents in Baghdad Category:2000s in Baghdad
title: 1 August 2007 Baghdad bombings
